Project #3

Summary

Bringing theatre to people in the comfort of their homes during covid.

Solution

In my third year of university, we were tasked with “bringing theatre to people during covid” and the idea I came up with was an interactive theatre production through Alexa. The user was able to make decisions for the main protagonists in the story to alter the story itself

Technologies Used
